name: SCUFFED (jaxxdev)
description:
backstory and lore 

you find yourself trapped in a box your head hurts the last thing you remember is taking your daughter to buy ice cream you start connecting the pieces "those bastards".

scuffed

scuffed is a retro shooter that rewards your "sheesh fye" gameplay at least i hope it does, honestly all the game design choices are made so you feel fast and unstoppable so hopefully, you get that feeling 

pre-alpha stuff

warning: this game is in its very very very early stages the storytelling needs work the environments need work the guns need work and so on ill appreciate any suggestion but also expect some jank.

WARNING

use jump a lot and I mean a lot if u want to enjoy the game you need to use jump every other second the game already makes it easy for u to chain jumps since it stores jump input like quake altho i am making the game easier for release and making the current state a higher difficulty. 

secrets

secrets are all around the game and if you don't look for them some levels may become extremely hard so look for them closely most secrets are doors to rooms that are hidden if you suspect a secret press (e) to check 

general interactions 

you can interact with a lot of stuff in the game this is made so you explore the world, what I'm saying is if you want to enjoy the game the way it's intended play it like it's a new buildengine game and truly explore it.
